## Changelog

2024/01/23

Added support for images using the \[img:\*.png\] tag

Added support for inline equations using $$*$$

2023/07/10

Added a check for non-ASCII, non-convertable characters. Informative warning messages are now issued that help users to find potentially problematic characters.
